paragraphs: Photographed by Arthur Elgort, Vogue, May 1985

Whether it’s a LWD or a midi-length prairie frock, white dresses for women are summer’s official-unofficial uniform. They’re comfortable no matter how high the temps may reach and they’re a great way to feel instantly styled without putting much thought into getting dressed.

As we gear up for a summer that will hopefully mark our reemergence, the first hints of spring’s warmth have us ready to start thinking (and dressing!) for the quickly approaching season ahead. And you’re going to need a great white dress. Wear one all summer long because there are only two situations when a white dress isn’t actually appropriate: when attending a wedding or when partaking in something messy that could put your clothing in danger of stains. Whether your preference is a gauzy tiered gown or a structured poplin mini, just add a loafer or a sandal, maybe a piece of jewelry, and you’re ready for whatever the day has in store for you. From shirtdresses and slip dresses, here are 25 easy white dresses for women to get you in the mood for summer.
